column1: Rev. Keith Kolzow will officiate at a funeral service for Jim
column2: 1:00 p.m. Wednesday (6/24/15) at the Olson Funeral Chapel in Rush City. A time of visitation and reviewal is planned for Tuesday evening from 5-8 P.M. and one hour prior to the service Wednesday. Military honors will be provided by the Grothe-Jacobson VFW Post #6692 and the Minnesota National Guard.
